FuncDef: The display bgp vpnv4 routing-table command displays information about BGP VPNv4 routes and BGP VPN routes based on specified multiple attribute values. The display bgp vpnv4 routing-table command displays information about BGP VPNv4 routes and BGP VPN routes based on specified multiple attribute values.
CLIs: display bgp vpnv4 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-table
display bgp vpnv4 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tableregular-expression <strRegular>

display bgp vpnv4 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tablecommunity [ <communityNum> | <strCommunityNum> | internet | no-advertise | no-export | no-export-subconfed | g-shut ] &<1-33> [ whole-match ]
display bgp vpnv4 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tablelarge-community [ <largeCommuStr> ] &<1-33> [ whole-match ]
display bgp instance <bgpName> vpnv4 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-table
display bgp instance <bgpName> vpnv4 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tableregular-expression <strRegular>

display bgp instance <bgpName> vpnv4 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tablecommunity [ <communityNum> | <strCommunityNum> | internet | no-advertise | no-export | no-export-subconfed | g-shut ] &<1-33> [ whole-match ]
display bgp instance <bgpName> vpnv4 { all | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> } routing-tablelarge-community [ <largeCommuStr> ] &<1-33> [ whole-match ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays BGP VPNv4 routes and BGP routes of VPN instances.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Displays about the BGP routes of a specified VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies the community number.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 4294967295.

Specifies the community number.
The value is a string of 1 to 11 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Displays the BGP routes carrying the internet community attribute.
-

Displays the BGP routes carrying the No-Advertise community attribute.
-

Displays the BGP routes carrying the No-Export community attribute.
-

Displays the BGP routes carrying the No-Export-Subconfed community attribute.
-

Display routes with the Grateful-Shutdown community attribute.
-

Indicates that the Large-Community attribute is fully matched.
-

Specifies a value of the Large-Community attribute.
The value is a string of 5 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the regular expression that matches AS_Path.
The value is a string of 1 to 80 characters.

Specifies a BGP multi-instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 80 characters.

Examples: Status codes: * - valid, > - best, d - damped, x - best external, a - add path,
<HUAWEI> display bgp vpnv4 vpn-instance vrf routing-table community
Status codes: * - valid, > - best, d - damped, x - best external, a - add path,
